name: listx

scripts.prestart: if (pgrep 'mongod' >/dev/null 2>&1); then echo 'MongoDB already running'; else sudo mongod --dbpath=/var/data --port=27070 --fork --logpath=./mongo/log.txt;fi
scripts.pretest: if (pgrep 'mongod' >/dev/null 2>&1); then echo 'MongoDB already running'; else sudo mongod --dbpath=/var/data --port=27070 --fork --logpath=./mongo/log.txt;fi

description: ListX - Shopping Lists on another level
